name: Duck Duck Canoes
description:
This game is best played with a controller!

CONTROLS: 
Move Left Oar: Left Analog Stick/WASD
Move Right Oar: Right Analog Stick/OKL;
Reset Ducks: Start/Esc

Spend a day on the lake reconnecting with nature and return all 5 ducklings to their mom! Pick up a duck/return them by rowing your canoe over to them. 

ASSETS USED:
Engine: Godot
3D Models: Kenney Game Assets 1 by Kenney
Font: 1980 by Void
Sounds: Birds from Videvo.net
Human Sprite: HUGE by S4m_ur4i
Duck Sprites: by calcputer
